wikipedia_page.main: Charlotte Fantelli is a British entrepreneur and filmmaker.

response: Dolan was the focus of a 2014 British promotional film, directed by Dolan's business partner Charlotte Fantelli, that followed Jota Sport on their quest to win the 24 Hours of Le Mans in the LMP2 category in 2014. The film followed Dolan and his Jota Sport teammates on their way to victory. Dolan is the owner and sole Director of Fantelli Productions.

Journey to Le Mans is a 2014 British documentary film directed by Charlotte Fantelli about British Privateer Team Jota Sport on their bid to win the 24 Hours of Le Mans in the LMP2 category in 2014."Journey to Le Mans review", The Telegraph, by Rebecca Jackson, 12 November 2014"Journey to Le Mans review", The Guardian, by Andrew Pulver, 6 November 2014 This film represents Charlotte Fantelli's directorial debut.

The film tells the story of racing driver and entrepreneur Simon Dolan and the rest of his motorsport team Jota Sport, following the highs and lows the team encountered. Charlotte Fantelli is Simon Dolan's business partner.https://www.bizmag.co.uk/News/newsStory.aspx?storyID=550§ionID=7 Simon Dolan is currently the sole Company Directorhttps://find-and-update.company-information.service.gov.uk/company/08086245/officers and the sole person with significant controlhttps://find-and-update.company-information.service.gov.uk/company/08086245/persons-with-significant-control for Fantelli Productions Limited.
